text: The Salt Lake Tribune is a newspaper based in Salt Lake City, Utah. It was founded in 1871 and was known as Mormon Tribune by some former LDS Church members William Godbe, Elias L.T. Harrison and John Tullidge. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Newspapers in the United States Category:Salt Lake City Category:1871 establishments in the United States Category:19th-century establishments in Utah
title: The Salt Lake Tribune
